name: SHAKEEL RIFATH
college: Hindustan Institute of technology and science

full_output.summary: Dynamic BTech in Computer Science and Engineering professional with expertise in Power BI, machine learning, Advanced Excel, Python, SQL, Canva, MS Word, PowerPoint, Email and Social media marketing. Proven ability to enhance decision-making, improve efficiency, and boost performance. Published researcher and skilled communicator, with over 20 impactful presentations, including at IEEE 2024. Ready to leverage analytical and technical skills to drive growth and optimize processes.

education.school: Hindustan Institute of technology and science

projects.name: Sales Performance Dashboard for GD Foods
projects.description: Enhanced GD Foods' decision-making process through a Power BI dashboard, leading to a 30% improvement in inventory management and reducing waste by 80 %. Crafted an advanced Power BI dashboard integrating MySQL and Excel, establishing data transparency and enabled 3+ departments to make informed decisions, leading to a 20% reduction in operational bottlenecks. Anticipated industry trends and market changes by deploying machine learning models; set achievable sales targets that boosted GD Foods' revenue growth by 15% and market competitiveness by 20%.

projects.name: Data-Driven Travel Recommendations
projects.description: Developed a novel system integrating IoT and data science to refine travel choices; streamlined processes, saving 50+ hours monthly and elevating user experience scores by 25%. Deployed real-time predictive models using sensor data from 50+ urban sources, improving air and sound pollution forecasting accuracy and mitigating high-risk travels in two-wheeler by 25%. Trained statistical models like logistic regression and decision trees to predict patient travel decision class(Y/N), enhancing decision-making accuracy by 80% in adverse environment conditions. Published an IEEE paper in 2024, detailing an innovative data-driven approach that optimized travel decision making processes and increased user satisfaction by 30%.

experiences.company_name: Muthu Innovators and Creators Pvt Ltd (MIC)
experiences.description: Spearheaded the creation of a data-driven sales dashboard on Power BI, enabling stakeholders to analyze critical sales metrics and patterns. Drove a 15% surge in cross-selling opportunities through targeted marketing initiatives and boosting revenue. Analysed 3,00,000 rows of sales data using Power Query Editor within Power BI for data pre-processing and transformation tasks, ensuring clean and structured data for analysis and visualization. Achieved a 2X increase in sales for a Retail Shop by leveraging data analytics and business intelligence for actionable insights that enhanced marketing strategy for the company.

soft_skills: Excellent time management and organizational skills
